resources.string: You either do not have root access or denied the request. In order to use torch, you must have root access.
Set the level of the torch
Warning!\nUsing the torch for long times may harm your device! Always be aware of that!
Need help? Ask for help on XDA Forums thread. Click to go there!
I don\'t care about the developer. Just give me an ad-free app!
Full-screen ads are now disabled. However, though you won\'t anymore see it on each click, only one full-screen ad will be shown at the start of the app.

Open Source Libraries: 
* Libsuperuser - Chainfire
 - https://github.com/Chainfire/libsuperuser
* android-seekbar-preference - gmazzo
 - https://github.com/gmazzo/android-seekbar-preference
Warning! If you keep the torch on for long time, your device might get damaged.
Help me to buy a cup of tea

Requires user to unlock the device to proceed
